statements: UPDATE arbitrage_orders SET order_type = 'BUY', order_amount = 150.50 WHERE order_id = 1234;

UPDATE arbitrage_orders SET order_amount = 5000.75, order_type = 'BUY' WHERE order_id = 101

UPDATE buy_orders SET quantity = 20, price = 50.00 WHERE order_id = 1001
UPDATE sell_orders SET price = 45.75, quantity = 10 WHERE trader_id = 2002
UPDATE buy_orders SET price = 150.57, quantity = 100 WHERE order_id = 101 AND trader_id = 201;

UPDATE sell_orders SET price = price * 1.05, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE trader_id = 202 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';

UPDATE buy_orders SET buy_price = buy_price + 5, buy_quantity = buy_quantity - 10 WHERE buy_order_id = 123;
